../frontend/static/dash/lib/components/D.description:
DashColorscales is a Dash wrapper for `react-colorscales`.
It takes an array of colors, `colorscale`, and
displays a UI for modifying it or choosing a new scale.

id.description: The ID used to identify this compnent in Dash callbacks

colorscale.description: Optional: Initial colorscale to display. Default is Viridis.

nSwatches.description: Optional: Initial number of colors in scale to display.

fixSwatches.description: Optional: Set to `True` to fix the number of colors in the scale.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called whenever any of the
properties change

../frontend/static/dash/lib/components/W.description:
Wordcloud is a wrapper component for react-wordcloud usage by dash.
It takes a property, `data`, containing a series of words and a series of weights and displays a wordcloud
or group of wordclouds depending on whether a `group` value has been specified.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

data.description: Server-side data containing words "data[group].x" and weights "data[group][y-prop]".

y.description: List of properties to use as weights.

group.description: List of properties to use as groups.
